title: Milky Way

nouns: The Milky Way Galaxy, from when it was thought the Universe (our universe) had only one galaxy
The Milky Way Galaxy, the galaxy in which Earth is located; extension of the night sky phenomenon.
Milky Way is the galaxy that contains our Solar System. Way
The galaxy containing the solar system; consists of millions of stars that can be seen as a diffuse band of light stretching across the night sky
The Milky Way is the galaxy that contains our Solar System.
The galaxy in which Earth is located
Spiral galaxy in the Local Group containing the Solar System
The "Milky Way Galaxy"
Spiral galaxy in which the Solar System is located.
Massive balls of plasma
Sphere of plasma held together by gravity, undergoing fusion
Luminous celestial body.
A luminous celestial body that is made from gases (particularly hydrogen and helium) and forms the shape of a sphere.
This article is for quotes about stars, or which make prominent mention of stars.
(astronomy) a celestial body of hot gases that radiates energy derived from thermonuclear reactions in the interior
A star is a massive, luminous sphere of plasma held together by its own gravity.
A luminous celestial body, made up of plasma (particularly hydrogen and helium) and having a spherical shape. Depending on context the sun may or may not be included.
The Sky is the portion of outer space or the atmosphere visible from a position within a world.
Everything that is above the surface of the Earth.
The atmosphere above a given point, especially as visible from the ground during the day.
The sky is everything that lies above the surface of the Earth, including the atmosphere and outer space.
The atmosphere and outer space as viewed from the earth
The part of the earth's atmosphere and space outside it that is visible from earth's surface. During the day it is perceived as blue, and at night as black.
Atmosphere above a point.
The sky at night.
The term night sky refers to the sky as seen at night.
The dark sky in the deep twilight or at night
Night or nighttime is the period of time between the sunset and the sunrise when the Sun is below the horizon.
The time after sunset and before sunrise while it is dark outside
Hours of darkness.
The period between sunset and sunrise, when a location faces far away from the sun, thus when the sky is dark.
Night is the period of time when the sun is below the horizon.
Part of the day when the Sun is not aloft
The hours of darkness between sunset and sunrise; the night.

description:
The Milky Way – a galaxy of billions of stars that includes our own solar system and planet earth.

Shown by many platforms as a night sky, with silhouettes of mountains or hills in the foreground.
apple_vendor_description: The Milky Way emoji, as seen on Apple devices, is a breathtaking celestial panorama, showcasing a swirl of vibrant blues and purples punctuated by countless shimmering stars. Apple's masterful use of smooth gradients and subtle lighting effects creates a profound sense of cosmic depth and wonder. This emoji evokes feelings of awe, vastness, and the mysteries of the universe, often used on Apple devices to express dreams, imagination, or an appreciation for the night sky.
